name: Angel's Wings
effect: white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

name: Great Oracular Bubble
effect: Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

name: Night-and-Flame Stance
effect: sweep forward with a burst of flames

name: Radahn's Rain
effect: The arrows will pour on foes like rain

name: Taker's Flames
effect: set things ablaze and steal HP

name: Transient Moonlight
effect: Attacks fire off a wave of light.

name: Bloodhound's Step
effect: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

name: Alabaster Lords' Pull
effect: create a gravity well dealing damage and pulling enemies in

name: Bear Witness!
effect: Grand the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

name: Bloodboon Ritual
effect:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother.
Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.
This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

name: Cursed-Blood Slice
effect: charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice

name: Death Flare
effect: inflicting the death ailment upon foes

name: Destined Death
effect:
dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's
maximum HP and continues to wear down HP

name: Devourer of Worlds
effect: Charge the scepter with magic to steal HP

name: Dynast's Finesse
effect: avoid an attack while getting some distance from foes to follow up with strong attack to lunge do another strong attack for a sweeping slice

name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
effect: Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning. Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

name: Flame Dance
effect: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

name: Flowing Form
effect: transforms armament into its liquid form

name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
effect:
unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.
Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave.

name: Ice Lightning Sword
effect: Call down a bolt of ice lightning

name: Knowledge Above All
effect:
Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all
within the area, including the caster

name: Last Rites
effect: Grant Sacred Order to yourself and allies in the area

name: Magma Guillotine
effect: triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

name: Mists of Slumber
effect: Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area. This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Moonlight Greatsword
effect:
Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with
frost

name: Nebula
effect: Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic

name: Reduvia Blood Blade
effect: Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloostains into airborne blood blades that cause hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Shriek of Milos
effect: reduces all damage negation and status resistances

name: Siluria's Woe
effect: Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind.

name: Starcaller Cry
effect: pulls in enemies with gravitational wave. Follow up with an addition input to slam down with gravity-infused swords

name: Waterfowl Dance
effect: Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks

name: Black Flame Tornado
effect: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

name: Enchanted Shot
effect: shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

name: Gravitas
effect: Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in.

name: Loretta's Slash
effect: Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

name: Seppuku
effect: Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

name: Blade of Death
effect: blade-like projectile reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP

name: Bloodhound's Finesse
effect:
Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

name: Corpse Piler
effect: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input, for further successive attacks.

name: Corpse Wax Cutter
effect: blade-like projectile

name: Erdtree Slam
effect: After jumping high in the air, crashing down sents golden shockwaves in all directions

name: Fires of Slumber
effect: The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Flame Spit
effect: launch a fireball from the barrel

name: Golden Retaliation
effect:
Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.
This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

name: Gravity Bolt
effect: sends a bolt crashing down a short distance away. Can be fired in rapid succession

name: Great-Serpent Hunt
effect:
powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward
thrust

name: Oath of Vengeance
effect: temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
effect: create a gravity well to send enemies flying away

name: Ordovis's Vortex
effect: slamming the blade down

name: Regal Roar
effect:
raising attack power, while sending
out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against

name: Sorcery of the Crozier
effect: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing projectiles that chase enemies

name: Storm Kick
effect: Creates a storm

name: Surge of Faith
effect: rain down fireballs in all directions

name: Zamor Ice Storm
effect: freezing storm that batters the surrounding

name: Barricade Shield
effect: Focus your energy into your shield, temporarily hardening

name: Blood Tax
effect: Unleashes a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.

name: Charge Forth
effect: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust Hold to cover a greater distance.

name: Endure
effect: boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

name: Flame of the Redmanes
effect: Produces a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

name: Mighty Shot
effect: Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

name: No Skill
effect: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.

name: Royal Knight's Resolve
effect: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

name: Sacred Blade
effect: Holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile

name: Spinning Slash
effect:
Slash foes as your body spins.
This momentum can connect into a final heavy attack.

name: Storm Wall
effect: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a Normal parry.

name: Stormcaller
effect: Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Sword Dance
effect: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

name: Thops's Barrier
effect: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Unsheathe
effect: holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

name: Wild Strikes
effect:
Swing armament with wild abandon.
Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

name: Golden Land
effect: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Storm Assault
effect: Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

name: Thunderstorm
effect: lightning storm

name: Assassin's Gambit
effect: self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps

name: Ground Slam
effect: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

name: Ice Spear
effect: Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

name: Lifesteal Fist
effect: A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

name: Lightning Ram
effect: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

name: Prayerful Strike
effect: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

name: Prelate's Charge
effect: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge

name: Sacred Order
effect: Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence

name: Sacred Ring of Light
effect: Gather a sacred ring of light

name: Storm Blade
effect: Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession

name: Vacuum Slice
effect: shearin vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile

name: Carian Greatsword
effect: Transform blade into a magical greatsword

name: Soul Stifler
effect: reduced defense

name: Barbaric Roar
effect: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks.

name: Barrage
effect: held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

name: Beast's Roar
effect: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.

name: Bloody Slash
effect: unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

name: Braggart's Roar
effect: Raises attack power, defense and stamina recover speed.

name: Carian Grandeur
effect: Transform blade into magical greatsword

name: Parry Skill
effect: Use this Skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This gives you a chance for a critical hit.

name: Shield Bash
effect:
Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance.
Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

name: Spectral Lance
effect: Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

name: Buckler Parry
effect: Use this Skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This is faster than a regular parry.

name: Golden Tempering
effect: grant attacks holy essence

name: Sea of Magma
effect: cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma

name: Spinning Chain
effect: Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successful attack.

name: Determination
effect: Hold your armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

name: Eruption
effect: Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava

name: Giant Hunt
effect: Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

name: Glintblade Phalanx
effect: Blades over your head that attack enemies

name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
effect: violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave

name: Impaling Thrust
effect: Build power, then lunge forward for a long thrust that pierces an enemy's guard

name: Lion's Claw
effect: Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament

name: Piercing Fang
effect: make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked

name: Poison Moth Flight
effect:
Slash with a poison-infused blade. Strike poisoned foes to deal significant
damage.

name: Quickstep
effect: Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

name: Raptor of the Mists
effect: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

name: Repeating Thrust
effect: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts. This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful. It can be used on all thrusting armaments.

name: Spinning Strikes
effect: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. ifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

name: Spinning Weapon
effect: Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

name: Square Off
effect: Slash up through enemy guards with a normal attack, or run and thrust with a strong attack.

name: Stamp Sweep
effect: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

name: Stamp Upward Cut
effect:
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

name: Storm Stomp
effect: Stomp the ground hard to kick up a temporary storm.

name: Through and Through
effect:
Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance.
Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

name: Troll's Roar
effect: powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes. Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.

name: War Cry
effect: strong attacks change to charging attacks

name: Firebreather
effect: Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

name: Glintstone Dart
effect:
Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust..

name: Glintstone Pebble
effect: employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust

name: Spinning Wheel
effect: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed

name: Torch Attack
effect: Thrust your torch forward to set foes ablaze

name: Golden Vow
effect: granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

name: Kick
effect: Push an enemy back with a high kick.Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.

name: Poisonous Mist
effect: Bathe armament in poison
